titles.title: Mogura no Adventure
Mole`s Adventure
もぐらのアバンチュール

anime.description: A mole named Kuro-chan falls asleep under the sun and embarks on a space voyage in his dreams. There, he meets some strange-looking aliens living on a different planet. Note: This is the oldest known surviving Japanese television animated work. Until its discovery, http://anidb.net/a5486 [Atarashii Douga: Mittsu no Hanashi], a 1960 black-and-white work produced by NHK, held that distinction.
